channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Must-Have Mindset in the Current Market
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The 5,500 level on the S&P 500 played a key role this year—first as support, now as resistance. A strong breakout here would be...

item.title: We Need to Break Through This Level First
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Since the big surge on April 9, the Nasdaq Composite has been trapped inside that day’s trading range—never breaking lower, but...

item.title: More Evidence the Worst is Behind Us
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! We just saw another massive breadth day—nearly 90% of stocks closed higher. That’s the second time in two weeks we’ve seen that...

item.title: There are Always Stocks Making New Highs
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Even in the worst markets, some stocks break out. Today's chart shows how—despite all the fear and volatility—we’re still seein...

item.title: What Comes After the Market Bottom
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! I’ve seen some wild sentiment readings over the years—but this one takes the cake. For eight straight weeks, more than half of ...
